summary: Implements a Qiskit transpiler pass that performs As‑Late‑As‑Possible (ALAP) scheduling on a circuit’s DAG, shifting each operation to the latest time permitted by data‑dependency and control‑flow constraints.
business_intent: Enable quantum‑circuit compilation tools to minimize idle periods and potentially reduce overall circuit depth by delaying operations to their latest feasible execution points, improving hardware utilization and execution efficiency.
